member.name: M:Sharpduino.Components.Led.Off
member.summary: Turn the led off. If a led is strobing, it will not stop. Use Led.Stop().Off() to turn off a led while strobing.

member.name: M:Sharpduino.Components.Led.Toggle
member.summary: Toggle the current state, if on then turn off, if off then turn on.

member.name: M:Sharpduino.Components.Led.Stop
member.summary: For interval operations, call stop to stop the interval. stop does not necessarily turn "off" the Led, in order to fully shut down an Led, a program must call stop().off(). This operation will only work with Leds attached to PWM pins.
